Upgrade your game.

HomeCourt is the free, interactive basketball app that helps anyone get better. It’s the personal basketball trainer that’s always with you, capturing your performance, your stats, and your progress—guiding you to the next level. With HomeCourt, every rep counts. 

TRAIN SMARTER
HomeCourt captures your moves and your stats as you train—so you can see your true skill level. HomeCourt uses the camera on your device to track your performance in real-time, everything from your jump shot to your crossover. In-depth data and analytics help you break down every session. HomeCourt calculates metrics like shooting percentage, accuracy, release time, dribble speed, vertical jump and more. You can even use Apple Watch to track your heart rate and save your data to HealthKit. 

ENGAGE IN FUN, INTERACTIVE DRILLS
Using HomeCourt is less like training and more like a video game. The immersive live-action experience is powered by AR (augmented reality), with virtual targets, audio cues, bonus levels, points and badges—it’s like you’re inside the game. Now practicing skills is engaging, not boring, so you’ll stick to it and improve more. 

LEARN FROM THE PROS
HomeCourt is an official partner of the NBA and provides access to the expertise of the most elite players in the game today. Train with interactive drills and instruction from NBA and WNBA athletes. Learn their moves and even compete against them in interactive challenges. 

COMPETE WITH FRIENDS
Don’t workout alone, compete virtually with your friends, family, and teammates. You can join a virtual Team on HomeCourt, or create your own Team for free. You can also challenge a friend or teammate to any HomeCourt activity with a time-shifted “Battle Mode” that matches you up head-to-head. As you compete in Battles, you collect trophies, badges, and coins, just like you would in a video game. Earn rewards and level up together.

SHOWCASE YOUR SKILLS
Engage in unique showcase activities and even get discovered directly by the NBA. Participants who opt-in to NBA Global Scout are eligible to receive invitations to select NBA tryouts, camps, tournaments, and showcases. As you build your profile on HomeCourt, you can also share your progress with individual coaches and scouts.

--
SET UP
HomeCourt is ready to use everywhere you bring your iPhone or iPad. No special basketballs, uncomfortable sensors, or expensive equipment is required. Just set up your phone with a clear view of the court and starting training and competing through HomeCourt.

PRICING
• Free: Access the full library of 100+ drills and activities. Get unlimited shot tracking.
• HomeCourt Plus: Access your full workout history, get complete skill ratings, join the members-only training club, request feedback from HomeCourt pro trainers, participate in HomeCourt Global Camp, and create up to 4 user profiles.

HomeCourt Plus is available for subscription as either monthly or yearly auto-renewable subscriptions. Payment will be charged to your App Store account upon the expiration of the free trial period. Subscription automatically renews unless the subscription is canceled or auto-renew turned off at least 24 hours before the expiration of the free trial period or the current subscription period. Subscription may be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to App Store account settings after purchase. Please visit https://www.homecourt.ai/legal/terms for the complete terms of use.

Got any questions or feedback?
Please shoot us an email at support@homecourt.ai. We'd love to hear from you.

This is a smart ballistic calculator for long range shooters. It helps shooters calculate hold overs, and scope settings necessary for long range shots. Works with large caliber and airguns.

This app is using temperature, altitude, humidity, atmospheric pressure, distance to target, target speed and direction, coriolis effect, slope angle, cant and your rifle configuration for calculate optimal vertical, horizontal and lead corrections.

Features:
• Can use G1, G2, G5, G6, G7, G8, GA, GC, GI, GL, GS, RA4 and even custom drag-functions (built-in editor), and can calculate trajectory without using ballistic coefficient!
• You can select reticle from the list (around 2600 reticles! including reticles from Carl Zeiss, Nightforce Optics, Kahles, Vixen Sport Optics, Premier Reticles, Primary Arms, Schmidt and Bender, SWFA, U.S. Optics, and Vortex Optics) and see hold overs at any magnification (see list of reticles supported here http://jet-lab.org/chairgun-reticles)
• List of bullets: around 4000 cartridges database, more than 2000 bullets database, around 700 G7 ballistic coefficient bullets database, around 500 air rifle pellets database includes American Eagle, Barnes, Black Hills, Federal, Fiocchi, Hornady, Lapua, Norma, Nosler, Remington, Sellier & Bellot, and Winchester (see list of bullet/cartridges supported here http://jet-lab.org/chairgun-cartridges )!
• Correction for coriolis effect
• Takes into account temperature of powder (powder sensitivity factor)
• Correction for spin drift
• Correction for vertical deflection of crosswind
• Trajectory validation (truing) by speed or ballistic coefficient
• Correction for gyroscopic stability factor
• Can measure incline angle with phone camera
• Can get current weather (include wind speed and wind direction) from internet for current location and for any place in the world
• Supports Imperial (grain, in, yard) and Metric units (gram, mm, meter)
• Elevation: Mil-MRAD, MOA, SMOA, Clicks, Inch/Cm, Turret
• Get accurate local pressure using internal barometer in iPhone/iPad
• Adjusts for atmospheric conditions for current and zero conditions (Density Altitude or Altitude, Pressure, Temperature and Humidity)
• Density altitude support (determined automatically for any place in the world)
• Ballistics chart (Range, Elevation, Windage, Velocity, Time Of Flight, Energy)
• Ballistics graph (Elevation, Velocity, Energy)
• Reticle Drop Chart
• Range cards
• Select target type from big list of targets (80+ available)
• Target size presets
• Second focal plane scope support
• Moving target lead calculation
• Fast windspeed/direction adjustment
• Integrated with smart sensors. With the tap of a button you can calibrate density altitude, Coriolis, cant and slope in real-time
• Unlimited equipment profiles (create own rifles and bullets)
• Full history of all your shootings
• Scope turret calibration
• Rangefinder
• Ballistic coefficient calculator
• Support Kestrel DROP, Kestrel 5x00, WeatherFlow WEATHERmeter, Skywatch BL, Vectronix, Terrapin X bluetooth devices
• Air laboratory (Air Density, Density Altitude, Relative Air Density (RAD), Dew Point, Station Pressure, Saturation Vapor Pressure, Virtual Temperature, Actual Vapor Pressure, Cumulus Cloud Base Height, Dry Air, Dry Air Pressure)
• Light/dark/gray color themes
• Built-in tutorials

Subscription available for $1.49/month, $9.99/year and provides access to all features.
